channel.title: [help]All of my questions (i got just one comment from 3 topics)<<<<<<<
channel.description:
Ok the first is that: some of my npc's are so week and i didn't die with lvl 3 player vs. lvl 159 tree spirit I asked how to get'em stronger i have been told that they are
3 ways npcagressive.java-never used before npchandler.java(adding the attack style plus their lowest and highest damage) npc.cfg-edit the health(works for me) (higher equals more damage)
i chose the 2nd option because i don't don't want give the npc's more hp how do i do that? my 2 question is: My server is working with hamachi (I know it's sucks) And i don't want Hamachi so i opend Ports and opend account at no-ip i downloaded the client updater and i told to my friend to login with the ip of the host that i opend in No-Ip and it still doing "Error Connecting to Server" what should i do plz help me i got just 1 comment from 3 topics >< ty for helpers ( ihope some ome will help me this time)

Well to be honest I think that you will have portforwarded incorrectly, as that it where most problems occur. Can you post a screenshot of what you have done (blank out your real ip address).

item.description:
@shon1091 wrote:

Ok the first is that:
some of my npc’s are so week and i didn’t die with lvl 3 player vs. lvl 159 tree spirit
I asked how to get’em stronger
i have been told that they are

3 ways npcagressive.java-never used before npchandler.java(adding the attack style plus their lowest and highest damage) npc.cfg-edit the health(works for me) (higher equals more damage)
i chose the 2nd option because i don't don't want give the npc's more hp how do i do that?

my 2 question is:
My server is working with hamachi (I know it’s sucks)
And i don’t want Hamachi
so i opend Ports
and opend account at no-ip
i downloaded the client updater
and i told to my friend to login with the ip of the host that i opend in No-Ip
and it still doing “Error Connecting to Server”
what should i do
plz help me i got just 1 comment from 3 topics ><
ty for helpers ( ihope some ome will help me this time)
